DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy two different physical activity regimens complementary alternative treatment option treatment obstructive sleep apnea . A secondary purpose study examine effect activity regimens various health consequence obstructive sleep apnea , include blood pressure , systemic inflammation , daytime functioning .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Physical Activity Regimens Treatments Obstructive Sleep Apnea
DOC.criteria: moderateintensity obstructive sleep apnea ( AHI > = 15 ) sedentary status current treatment obstructive sleep apnea ( CPAP , oral device , etc . ) significant cardiovascular , pulmonary , metabolic disease uncontrolled hypertension inability exercise ( e.g. , musculoskeletal , neuromuscular , orthopedic problem )
